alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 24 at 4:14AM MST until July 24 at 6:15AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 615 AM MST. * At 411 AM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Saddlebrooke to 16 miles east of Florence to 7 miles north of Kearny, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong winds of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 177 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 169 and 178. US Highway 60 between mile markers 186 and 227. Locations impacted include... Queen Creek, East Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Casa Grande, Apache Junction, Florence, Coolidge, Superior, Gold Canyon, and Arizona City. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
